script.dialog: Hello, Zaraden dreamer!
Oh. Dis dream is being shared.
|wave|Hi, other space aliens!
We are Scrambla!
But you probably know dis already.
Sorry for what we did,     or will do?
Time is a little hard to follow for dis Shambles like us.
We are a Shamble.|L||!|Dis means a part of us exists in a higher dimension.
But we can use dis Shamble powers to help you!
Please help us Scrambla to love again.|L||!|If you do, we will share with you our powers!
We can make a, uh, portal to another time.|L||!|Dis portal thing is called a |C3|linky synapse.
You give us your gifts and we will put dem in our |C3|linky synapse.|C0|
Dis gifts will be waiting for you next morning!
You can take dose gifts and become more powerful before dis first battle!
You can also choose to leave dis gifts in our synapse for another day.
You can save many gifts until you have a |C3|super powerful combo|C0| to start with!
We hope dis powers can help you!
Oh yis, one more thing.
|wave|We want a hug when we see you!
Okee!     |wave|Bye for now!
